question: I receive financial assistance to help pay for the cost of health coverage and care through Healthcare.gov. Will I still receive financial assistance through the new state program?
text:
I receive financial assistance to help pay for the cost of health coverage and care through Healthcare.gov. Will I still receive financial assistance through the new state program?
          
        
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace uses the same standards to determine your ability to receive financial assistance to help pay for the cost of health coverage and care as Healthcare.gov. Your ability to receive
Advanced Premium Tax Credits (APTC)
to lower the cost of your premium, or
Cost-sharing Reductions
to lower the cost of using healthcare services, will not change because of the transition from Healthcare.gov to Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
